content: this pattern is worked from side to side by creating two identical l shaped panels you will then flip the right panel over to mirror the left and stitch the spine of your cardigan together creating a u shape after that you will fold the panel in half bringing that top to the bottom and seaming from the armpit to the hip the sleeves will then be worked right onto the body and the hood will be done similar an extension of the front edging some ribbing pockets and you re done
